revised_title: Achieving and Maintaining Quality in Manufacturing
tldr: The author discusses the importance of quality in manufacturing and how it can be achieved through design for use, maintenance, and manufacture. They emphasize the need to consider the whole life cost of a product and the role of the user in maintaining quality. The author also highlights the challenges in defining and measuring quality, which varies depending on the perspective of the user, designer, and other stakeholders.
